main event: An observer reported a sighting of a round orange-red object approximately 30 feet in diameter with pods on the bottom, which was observed for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The observer failed to investigate further when requested,Chanute AFB stated that no personnel were available to investigate the sighting,The object was reported to have a glowing orange-red coloration,The sighting lasted for 20 minutes,The report concluded that there was nothing unusual observed about the object.
witness description: the observer's details were not clearly provided, identified as a civilian
